lore: To face Ghazghkull Thraka in battle is to die. Messily. He is a totemic war leader of great kunnin’ and terrifying presence who enjoys the personal protection of the Ork gods, not that he seems to need it! Makari bears aloft the personal Waaagh! banner of Ghazghkull. There isn’t a greenskin living who doesn’t fight harder in sight of that flag.

otherAbilities.Prophet of Da Great Waaagh!:: While this unit is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes a melee attack, add 1 to the Hit roll and add 1 to the Wound roll .
otherAbilities.Ghazghkull’s Waaagh! Banner (Aura):: While a friendly ORKS unit is within 12" of Makari, if you have called a Waaagh! this battle round , melee weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [LETHAL HITS] ability.
